channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Watson Knowledge Catalog on-prem
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Watson Knowledge Catalog on-prem

item.title: CVE-2022-41731|2024-08-03T12:49:43.943Z -- ibm -- watson%20knowledge%20catalog%20on-prem
item.description: IBM Watson Knowledge Catalog on Cloud Pak for Data 4.5.0 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 237402.
